title: Vincent L. Ott
text:
To draw meaningful conclusions from data, you have to visualize it.
Raincloud plots are incredibly useful for this.
And the best thing is: You can make your own in a few clicks.


Raincloud Plot of Bodymass and Flipper Length in Penguins

title: Vincent L. Ott
text:
If you want to draw meaningful conclusions from data,
you should visualize it as it might otherwise mislead you.
For many scenarios in empirical sciences,
so called raincloud plots are incredibly useful for this.
In this blog post I explain how raincloud plots work and
how you can easily use them to visualize your own data.
For example, to see how penguins¬¥ body mass and flipper length are distributed:

title: Vincent L. Ott
text:
Astronaut Spacewalking
A spacewalk is ‚Äúany activity in outer space outside a spacecraft‚Äù (Wikipedia).








Based on the paper by Corlett et al.¬†(2020). Bottom plot done in a few clicks.
Technically, both space and moon walk times are shown (extravehicular activity).
